mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.OCCRRNC_DE , a.SVC_NM AS "srvcNm" , a.METHOD_NM , a.PROCESS_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS "processSeCodeNm" , a.PROCESS_TIME , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS "rqesterNm" FROM COMTH_SYS_LOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM033') c ON a.PROCESS_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE a.REQUST_ID = #{requstId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTS_SYS_LOG_SUMMARY SELECT b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.SVC_NM , b.METHOD_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'C' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CREAT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'U' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UPDT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RDCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN b.PROCESS_SE_CODE = 'D' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DELETE_CO , 0 AS OUTPT_CO , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM COMTH_SYS_LOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT c.OCCRRNC_DE FROM COMTS_SYS_LOG_SUMMARY c WHERE RTRIM(c.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR(ADDDATE(now(), -1),'YYYYMMDD') ) AND RTRIM(b.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR(ADDDATE(now(), -1),'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.SVC_NM , b.METHOD_NM
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTH_SYS_LOG WHERE RTRIM(OCCRRNC_DE) < TO_CHAR(ADDDATE(now(), -1),'YYYYMMDD')
